info.descen: How about baking a birthday cake for her?

sentense.en: Hi, Cindy. Why weren’t you at school today?
sentense.en_: Hi, Cindy. Why weren’t you at school today?
sentense.ko: 안녕, Cindy. 너 오늘 왜 학교에 오지 않았니?

sentense.en: I’m sorry to hear that. Have you seen a doctor?
sentense.en_: I’m sorry to hear that. Have you seen a doctor?
sentense.ko: 그렇다니 안 됐구나. 의사에게 진찰은 받았니?

sentense.en: Yes, I have. I’m getting better now.
sentense.en_: Yes, I have. I’m getting better now.

sentense.en: Okay. By the way, were there any assignments in class today?
sentense.en_: Okay. By the way, were there any assignments in class today?
sentense.ko: 알았어. 그건 그렇고 오늘 수업에서 숙제는 있니?

sentense.en: Well, you know me. I just don’t want to miss anything. That’s all.
sentense.en_: Well, you know me. I just don’t want to miss anything. That’s all.
sentense.ko: 그런데 네가 나를 잘 알잖아. 난 어떤 것도 빠뜨리고 싶지 않아. 그게 전부야.

sentense.en: Okay. We didn’t get any homework in history or English.
sentense.en_: Okay. We didn’t get any homework in history or English.

sentense.en: How about biology? Our biology teacher always gives us homework.
sentense.en_: How about biology? Our biology teacher always gives us homework.
sentense.ko: 생물은? 우리 생물 선생님께서는 항상 숙제를 내시잖아.

sentense.en: True, but I don’t remember what it is. Hold on a second.
sentense.en_: True, but I don’t remember what it is. Hold on a second.
sentense.ko: 그렇지, 하지만 숙제가 무엇인지 기억이 안 나는데. 전화를 끊지 말고 기다려봐.
